title: FS T206 Sherry Magie error card PSA 1
author: thenavarro

posts.post_title: FS T206 Sherry Magie error card PSA 1
posts.post_content:
Card itself is a dog.  Flaws as clearly shown.  But an opportunity to add it if you need it.

Price is firm at $6400.  If it sells, great, if it doesn't, no big deal.  Scans are from when I purchased it at Heritage.  If you need pics to prove I have it, send me an email to [url]navarro@flash.net[/url] as my phone pics are too large to upload in the thread.  Or if you need references, just ask around, I'm sure someone will vouch for me.  

You can pay cash and pick up in person in the Dallas Fort Worth metroplex (I work in the Federal Building in Farmers Branch) or I also accept wires.  Card will be shipped registered mail if you don't pick it up in person.  

Mike
Awesome card Mike....and I vouch for you as well.
Hello.  Is this card still for sale?

The Magie is on hold pending arrangements

Thanks
Mike.......great card!!! hate to say I think that was a cheap price:)
Mike.......great card!!! hate to say I think that was a cheap price:)

Considering you're paying an extra $6350 just for the letter "I", it really isn't.  

Hahahahaha.  Just kidding.  I fkn love that card!
